item.title: 个人简介
item.description: 史兴杰 南京财经大学，统计系副教授(校聘教授) 国际统计学会推选会员（ISI Elected member） 现场统计研究会环境与资源统计学会理事 研究方向：组学遗

item.title: Publications
item.description: Cheng, Qing; Qiu, Tingting; Chai, Xiaoran; Sun, Baoluo; Xia, Yingcun; Shi, Xingjie\(^\ast\); Liu, Jin\(^\ast\); MR-Corr\(^2\): A two-sample Mendelian randomization method that accounts for correlated horizontal pleiotropy using correlated instrumental variants, 2021, R Package Zhang, Xiao; Liu, Xu; Shi, Xingjie\(^\ast\); Model Selection for Varying Coefficient Nonparametric Transformation Model, 2021.
